id.description: Unique identifier for the timer option.

skill.description: Skill level associated with the timer.

value.description: Represents the timer's value. The unit depends on the 'category' field: 'roundTimer', 'coolDownTimer', and 'matchStartTimer' use seconds, while 'totalRounds' uses a count.

default.description: Indicates whether this timer is the default option.

required.description: Indicates whether this timer must be included in the game configuration for the game to function properly.

description.description: Human readable explanation of the timer.
